biotools.summary:
Prediction of Lysine Lipoylation in Proteins based on the Support Vector Machine.

A Predictor based on Support Vector Machine for lysine lipoylation in Proteins.

The file named Algotithm contains python code for different classification algorithms: KNN, Decision Tree, Logistic Regression, Naive Bayes.

The file named Encoding schemes contains code for different encoding schemes: PSSM, BPB, AAindex, BLOSUM62, Binary.

bioschemas.name: LipoSVM
